name: Tyler Jenkins
persona: Tyler is a first-year Computer Science student who has struggled to adapt to the demands of university life, resulting in a very low CGPA. He often finds it difficult to stay organized and motivated, and tends to procrastinate on assignments and studying. While Tyler does not experience much test anxiety, his low self-discipline and perseverance have hindered his academic progress. He is aware that he needs to develop better study habits and motivation if he wants to succeed in his chosen field.
